title: This Defense Contractor Stock Shot Up 9% Today: Here's Why
snippet: BofA cited growing momentum in V2X's core logistics and operations work, as well as its ability to secure contracts in higher-value, higher-margin segments, as key takeaways from the company's recent contract wins.

title: Safety Shot Invests $25M in BONK Memecoin, Stock Drops 50%
snippet: Safety Shot stock dropped 50% after investing $25M in BONK memecoin and acquiring a stake in BONK.fun, which dominates Solana token launches.

title: Safety Shot, GrowGeneration, And Altria: Top Three Consumer Stocks That Drew The Highest Retail Chatter On Stocktwits
snippet: Retail user message count on Safety Shot, GrowGeneration, and Altria Group stocks saw a massive jump in the last 24 hours on Stocktwits. At the same time, sentiment surrounding these companies ranged from 'bullish' to 'extremely bullish' territories.

title: Nasdaq Firm Safety Shot Stock Falls 50% After It Launches BONK Treasury
snippet: Nasdaq-listed Safety Shot has seen its stock price drop by more than 50%. This comes shortly after it announced BONK as its core treasury asset.

title: Prediction: This Artificial Intelligence (AI) Stock Could Double by 2026
snippet: AI specialist delivered terrific results recently, and its fast-growing customer base points toward better times ahead.

title: Paramount Skydance Shares Pop, With Market Watchers Comparing It to a 'Meme Stock'
snippet: After shares of the new Paramount Skydance shot up double digits, Wall Street watchers compared it to a meme stock.

title: Nasdaq-listed firm slumps 50% on BONK memecoin treasury play
snippet: Nasdaq-listed Safety Shot partners with the BONK memecoin for a $25 million token allocation, but stock fell 50% as the company pivoted to memecoins.

title: Safety Shot slides after selecting memecoin BONK as its core treasury asset
snippet: Bonk is a meme coin and community-driven cryptocurrency built on the Solana ( SOL-USD) blockchain, released in December 2022 through a large airdrop to Solana users. The partnership is expected to enhance Safety Shot's ( SHOT) financial position, diversify its asset base, and unlock new avenues for shareholder value creation.
